about_the_game:
Autocrats, First Person Government Simulation Game

Build your own country and rule as an autocrat. Work for the welfare of your citizens or war for global hegemony.

Appointment

After Humanity united under the World Republic following a series of global crises, the Republic began expanding into space, establishing colonies on planets like MORA. However, internal dissent grew as some questioned the need for a singular global authority. To manage this, the Republic started relocating separatists to these new colonies. You are now assigned to establish and manage a colony on MORA under the World Republic’s directive.

Gameplay

The game includes two modes: First-Person and Government. You can switch between these modes. Both modes are used to build, develop, and govern your country.

MORA

MORA is an Earth analog planet, and similar to Earth, there are two main areas: the City and the Untouched Wilderness. The City consists of lands connected to a country. In these lands, you can meet your vital needs depending on the economic state of the country. In the Untouched Wilderness, you cannot fulfill your vital needs, but you can store supplies in the cities and search for resources suitable for colonization on behalf of your country.

Key Features

  • First-Person
  • Government Simulation
  • Open World
  • City Build
  • Resource Management
  • War and Peace

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 9400F | ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 | Rx 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Autocrats is a first-person government simulation game. Build and develop your own country in an open world on first-person mode. Manage your resources, train your army and declare war on other countries. Establish diplomatic relations and form alliances.
